data.content: Implemented buildTakePrompt on BackendPort interface. All backends (beads, knots, bd-cli, stub, mock) implement the method. Knots backend calls kno claim --json with agent metadata flags. Beads returns beat metadata with show commands. Terminal-manager now delegates task-specific prompt to backend and wraps with execution instructions. All 797 tests pass, types clean. Commit: 89b6ae9
